TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit FileCodeGroup extends System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup
Public NotInheritable Class FileCodeGroup Inherits CodeGroup
public ref class FileCodeGroup sealed : System::Security::Policy::CodeGroup

summary.span: Grants permission to manipulate files located in the code assemblies to code assemblies that match the membership condition.

span.span: Grants permission to manipulate files located in the code assemblies to code assemblies that match the membership condition.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代码组是构建基块的代码访问安全性策略。Code groups are the building blocks of code access security policy. 每个策略级别包含可以有子代码组的根代码组。Each policy level consists of a root code group that can have child code groups. 每个子代码组可以具有其自己的子代码组;此行为将扩展到任意数量的级别，从而形成一个树。Each child code group can have their own child code groups; this behavior extends to any number of levels, forming a tree. 每个代码组有一个确定根据该程序集的证据是否属于给定的程序集的成员资格条件。Each code group has a membership condition that determines if a given assembly belongs to it based on the evidence for that assembly. 其成员资格条件匹配给定的程序集的唯一代码组和它们的子代码组应用策略。Only code groups whose membership conditions match a given assembly and their child code groups apply policy. 具有相同的子匹配语义与。 has the same child matching semantics as . 但是，返回一个权限集，其中包含动态计算，授予对从其运行该代码; 的目录的文件访问权限仅返回一个静态的权限集。However, returns a permission set containing a dynamically-calculated that grants file access to the directory from which the code is run; only returns a static permission set. 授予文件访问权限的类型作为参数传递给构造函数。The type of file access granted is passed as a parameter to the constructor. 此代码组仅匹配运行通过文件的协议，即，具有指向文件或 UNC 路径的 Url 的程序集的程序集。This code group only matches assemblies run over a file protocol, that is, assemblies that have URLs that point to a file or UNC path. ## Examples 下面的示例演示使用的成员类。The following example shows the use of members of the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt/CPP/members.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt/CS/members.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建一个基本代码组。This constructor creates a basic code group. 子代码组可以添加与方法。Child code groups can be added with the method. 返回一个权限集，其中包含动态计算，授予对从其运行代码的目录的文件访问权限。 returns a permission set containing a dynamically-calculated that grants file access to the directory from which the code is run. 授予访问权限的类型由`access`参数。The type of access granted is determined by the `access` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用构造函数。The following code shows the use of the constructor. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement Resolve(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed

span.span: The evidence for the assembly.

summary.span: Resolves policy for the code group and its descendants for a set of evidence.

span.span: Resolves policy for the code group and its descendants for a set of evidence.

returns.span: A policy statement consisting of the permissions granted by the code group with optional attributes, or if the code group does not apply (the membership condition does not match the specified evidence).

span.span: A policy statement consisting of the permissions granted by the code group with optional attributes, or if the code group does not apply (the membership condition does not match the specified evidence).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将给定的加载程序集的证据，通过先检查针对指定的证据的成员资格条件评估代码组。Given evidence for an assembly to be loaded, this method evaluates the code group by first checking the membership condition against the specified evidence. 如果没有匹配项，则此方法返回的代码组，其中包括评估的子代码组的策略语句。If there is a match, this method returns a policy statement for the code group, including evaluation of child code groups. .NET Framework 安全系统使用上的策略级别来确定加载的代码从生成的策略语句和代码授予哪些权限请求的程序集。The .NET Framework security system uses on the policy levels to determine which permissions to grant to loaded code from the resulting policy statements and the code request on the assembly. 窗体基于的权限集和使用联合语义指定的`evidence`。 uses union semantics and forms a permission set based on the specified by `evidence`. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用方法来解析代码组的策略。The following code shows the use of the method to resolve policy for the code group. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt#19](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt/CPP/members.cpp#19)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt/CS/members.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt/VB/Form1.vb#19)]

The current policy is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup ResolveMatchingCodeGroups(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed

span.span: The evidence for the assembly.
Resolves matching code groups.

returns.span: A that is the root of the tree of matching code groups.

span.span: A that is the root of the tree of matching code groups.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将给定的加载程序集的证据，通过先检查针对指定的证据的成员资格条件评估代码组。Given evidence for an assembly to be loaded, this method evaluates the code group by first checking the membership condition against the specified evidence. 如果没有匹配项，则此方法返回的根代码组。If there is a match, this method returns a root code group. 返回的代码组包含子代码组，因而也就可以有根据需要以反映所提供的证据匹配的代码组的完整集合的子代码组。The code group that is returned contains child code groups, which in turn can have child code groups as necessary to reflect the complete set of code groups that were matched by the evidence provided. 窗体基于的权限集和使用联合语义指定的`evidence`。 uses union semantics and forms a permission set based on the specified by `evidence`. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用方法来解析匹配的代码组。The following code shows the use of the method to resolve matching code groups. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt/CPP/members.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt/CS/members.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt/VB/Form1.vb#9)]
